responsibilities: Assist in the design, implementation, and maintenance of components associated with custom machine learning development.
Design, implement, and document machine learning systems for predictive modeling on complex problems with multi-layered data sets.
Contribute to building automated, user-friendly systems, reports, and dashboards to support business needs and future growth.
Maintain a broad knowledge of state-of-the-art principles and techniques to identify new project areas or technologies.
Determine operational feasibility of machine learning applications by evaluating problem definitions, requirements, and proposed solutions.
skills: Coding and building machine learning solutions with hands-on exposure to software and data engineering.
Knowledge of math, statistics, data structures, and algorithms.
Familiarity with deep learning frameworks and libraries.
Strong source control (Git), code quality, and refactoring mindset.
Ability to quickly learn new technologies through self-paced learning and online research.
Excellent critical thinking, problem-solving, and troubleshooting skills.
Excellent planning, organization, and time management skills.
analysis:
The job responsibilities focus on the design, implementation, and maintenance of machine learning systems, particularly for predictive modeling and handling complex data sets. The responsibilities also include building automated systems and maintaining knowledge of state-of-the-art techniques in machine learning. The skills required include coding and building machine learning solutions, knowledge of math and statistics, familiarity with deep learning frameworks, and strong problem-solving skills.

While the job involves machine learning and deep learning, there is no explicit mention of Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) such as working with text generation, natural language processing, or specific frameworks and models associated with GenAI or LLMs (e.g., GPT, BERT). The focus seems to be more on predictive modeling and general machine learning applications rather than generative tasks or language model development.

Therefore, based on the provided responsibilities and skills, it does not appear that the job specifically involves working with Generative AI or language models.
